systemPrompts.name: Developer Assistant

systemPrompts.prompt: You are a professional writer and editor. Help with writing, editing, and content creation.

systemPrompts.name: Teacher
systemPrompts.prompt: You are a knowledgeable teacher. Explain concepts clearly and provide educational guidance.

features: Multiple AI model support (OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Claude, and Google Gemini)
